entry.dcterms:description: economic institutional form, property nexus, workers, rentability, production, operation, export activity, transportation and invoicing practices, taxing, debts
entry.dcterms:subject: labour and employment
economic policy
income, property and savings

consumption/consumer behavior
trade, industry and markets
economic organization
survey data
time-series
A random sample of companies employing 50 people or more; sample is based on the registry of the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH).
Data collection with questionnaire, administered by interviewers, and self-administered questionnaires.
